title: (x) Serif face on Van Cleef & Arpels website - Times {Florian}
content:
Hey, am not saying this is a nice font, but I gotta find out what it is for some work, I have been asked to do. The font is used on Van Cleef & Arples website [http://www.vancleef-arpels.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141124153123/http:/www.vancleef-arpels.com/ "http://www.vancleef-arpels.com")

Any ideas?

Huge thanks

Alex

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141124153123/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_40.jpg) | 23.79 KB |
author: Alex Wiltshire

comments.content:
Hi Alex,

‘Craftmanship’ looks like some Times (New Roman?) to me.  
F

No it can't be!

How terrible! In two senses, firstly that was my first worst dread, and secondly, I should have known!

Ta
Do you mean the logo font or the rest?
